Job Description: RESPONSIBILITIES:  -  Work closely with stakeholders to make sure projects are being delivered in a timely manner with high quality. -  Develop and Manage a team of Developers and guide them to ship high - quality code.  -  You are responsible for continuously improving and growing your team. -  Drive Technical Vision and Direction for deployments with clients ,  architect integration of Android ,  iOS and Javascript SDK inside partner applications. -  Collaborate with Sales ,  PM ,  Clients ,  Developers ,  and QA to ensure the product is delivered per expectations within estimated timelines. -  Support the sales process where required with technical know - how and product information. -  Thrive in ambiguity by exploring new problem spaces ,  identifying gaps and filling them with the correct people and solutions.REQUIREMENTS : -  Bachelor's degree in Science ,  Technology ,  Engineering  -  2 years of experience managing large ,  fast - paced engineering teams. -  Must have worked in a client facing role even in a small capacity.  -  Deep understanding of software development / engineering lifecycle from conception to delivery.  -  Good written and verbal communication skills.  -  Demonstrated ability in delivering projects on time with quality. -  Hands on Coding experience is a Must.
